segments.text: Greetings should never be ignored in the interview .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . It is helpful to shorten the distance between you and the interviewer and create a lively atmosphere .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Appropriate greetings will win the interviewer's favorable impression
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But you should pay special attention to your words and attitudes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In the beginning of the interview , greet the interviewer with a kind smile .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In the interview , use polite words , such as ' Thank you ' , or ' Please ' .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's right . Details can mean succeed or fail .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When talking you should focus your eyes on the interviewer in order to closely watch his or her expressions .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: At the end of the interview , you should make your acknowledgements and say Goode .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Whatever the result is , you should keep your good demeanor .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Only in this way can you leave a good impression on the interviewer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In short , you should present the best of yourself throughout the interview .
segments.speaker: S2
